message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn to propose a bit more for myself. Let's close this deal quickly, the clock is ticking!
Come on, let's meet in the middle, time is running out!
Okay, Alice, let's split the difference from my last offer. We need to agree before the money shrinks even more!
I'll give you a tiny bit more, but I'm not going below this
This is getting ridiculous.  Let's just split it down the middle and call it a day.  Any more haggling and we'll both lose out.
